script.code:
PENALTY = variables.get("PENALTY") SOLVER = variables.get("SOLVER") MAX_ITERATIONS = variables.get("MAX_ITERATIONS") N_JOBS = variables.get("N_JOBS")
variables.put("PENALTY_PARA", PENALTY) variables.put("SOLVER_PARA", SOLVER) variables.put("MAX_ITERATIONS_PARA", MAX_ITERATIONS) variables.put("N_JOBS_PARA", N_JOBS) variables.put("ALGORITHM_NAME", "LogisticRegression") variables.put("SUPERVISED_ALGORITHM", "True") variables.put("CLASSIFICATION_MEASURE", "True")
